definitions.description: A large black passerine bird (Corvus corax), similar to the crow, but larger. It is native of the northern parts of Europe, Asia, and America, and is noted for its sagacity.
Of the color of the raven; jet black; as, raven curls; raven darkness.
Prey; plunder; food obtained by violence.
To obtain or seize by violence.
To prey with rapacity; to be greedy; to show rapacity.
